fixed_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to 1 foe equal to 180.0%/189.0%/198.0% of Attack. If foe has an elemental ailment, increase this skill's damage by 25%. Increase nuclear allies' Attack by 20.0%/21.0%/22.0% for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Imperial Purge

innate_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to all foes equal to 71.1/74.6/78.1% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 22% for foes with an elemental ailment.
innate_skill.name: Cosmic Flare

innate_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 10.5% when surrounded by enemies.
innate_skill.name: Adverse Resolve IV

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 17.5%. When using a skill on a foe, for each elemental ailment on the main target, increase Nuclear damage taken by 8% for 2 turns. Stacks up to 3 times.
passive_skill.name: Tower of Purification

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 17.5%. When using a skill on a foe, for each elemental ailment on the main target, increase Nuclear damage taken by 10% for 2 turns. Stacks up to 3 times.
passive_skill.name: Tower of Purification I

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 17.5%. When using a skill on a foe, for each elemental ailment on the main target, increase Nuclear damage taken by 10% for 2 turns. Stacks up to 3 times. All other foes take 20% of this effect.
passive_skill.name: Tower of Purification II

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 17.5%. When using a skill on a foe, for each elemental ailment on the main target, increase Nuclear damage taken by 10% for 2 turns. Stacks up to 3 times. All other foes take 40% of this effect.
passive_skill.name: Tower of Purification III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Nuclear damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
